Html:
Hi, All,

      I have two ComboBox: cbox1 and cbox2. Both have SelectionChange event. data populated in cbox2 is dependant on selection of cbox1. Is there any way to prevent event call when I set intial index in cbox1? What I mean is such event can only invoked by user not by code.

     Thanks very much for your help.

     T.W
